description: Follow this easy recipe for the ultimate Christmas condiment. Pickled red onions go perfectly with rich meat like ham and pork, or tossed into potato salad.
name: Pickled Red Onions Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place vinegar, sugar, salt flakes, fennel seeds and peppercorns in a saucepan and bring to the boil over high heat. Allow to cool.
Place onion in a bowl and pour over vinegar mixture. Set aside for 15 minutes to lightly pickle. Store in a sterilised glass jar or an airtight container in the fridge for up to a month.
